publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-8138 John Wilson: Coalfield Regeneration Trust Secures Funding—That the Parliament congratulates the Coalfield Regeneration Trust on securing funding of almost £1.6 million from the Scottish Government for 2011-12; acknowledges that the trust has given support to a wide range of projects throughout Scotland to enable them to increase access to employment and lifelong learning and promote community welfare and support services; recognises that, since 2008, North Lanarkshire has received £371,017 of funding across 25 different projects; commends the work of the trust in what it sees as its hard work in improving the lives of those living in coalfield communities, and further recognises the numerous projects that it considers will benefit from this extra funding by bringing help and support to communities. Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
